scripts.dev: sudo service mongodb start && concurrently "cd service-provider-1 && nodemon server.js 3001" " cd service-provider-2 && nodemon server.js 3002 " " cd service-integrator && nodemon server.js 3000 "
scripts.start: sudo service mongodb start && cd service-provider-1 && npm i && cd .. && cd service-provider-2 && npm i && cd .. && cd service-integrator && npm i && cd .. && concurrently "cd service-provider-1 && npm start" " cd service-provider-2 && npm start" " cd service-integrator && npm start"
